com.view.viewflow

类 ViewFlow

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.view.viewflow.ViewFlow

  • public class ViewFlow
extends <any>
    A horizontally scrollable ViewGroup with items populated from an Adapter. The ViewFlow uses a buffer to store loaded Views in. The default size of the buffer is 3 elements on both sides of the currently visible View, making up a total buffer size of 3 * 2 + 1 = 7. The buffer size can be changed using the sidebuffer xml attribute.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  ViewFlow.ViewSwitchListener
      Receives call backs when a new View has been scrolled to.
